* ยง 29.19 Powers and duties of peace officers acting pursuant to their
 special duties and police officers to apprehend, restrain,
 and transport persons to facilities.
 A person who has been committed or admitted to a department facility
and who has been reported as escaped therefrom or from lawful custody,
or who resists or evades lawful custody, may be apprehended, restrained,
transported to, and returned to such school or hospital by any peace
officer, acting pursuant to his special duties, or any police officer,
and it shall be the duty of any such officer to assist any
representative of a department facility to take into custody any such
person upon the request of such representative.
 * NB Effective June 30, 2027
